description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2020-Sep-11 09:45:42

SessionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented on the start of a drive session. This ID uniquely defines a drive session for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

FuelCell_SerialNumber.description: The unique serial number of the Fuel Cell currently connected to the telemetry device. It is assumed the telemetry device is mounted to a truck that is powered by the fuel cell.

FuelCell_SystemStatus.description: Indicates current Fuel Cell system status.

oneOf.title: Startup
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell system status is currently in the Startup state.

oneOf.title: Ready
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell system status is currently in the Ready state.

oneOf.title: Shutdown
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell system status currently is in the Shutdown state.

oneOf.title: Fault
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell system status is currently in the Fault state.

oneOf.title: Idle
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell system status is currently in the Idle state.

oneOf.title: Unknown
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell system status is currently unknown.

FuelCell_ReFuelStatus.description: Indicates current Fuel Cell Re-Fueling status.

oneOf.title: NotReFueling
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell is currently not re-fueling.

oneOf.title: ReFueling
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell is currently re-fueling.

oneOf.title: Unavailable
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell re-fueling status is currently unavailable.

oneOf.title: Error
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell re-fueling status is currently in an error condition.

oneOf.title: Unknown
oneOf.description: The Fuel Cell re-fueling status is currently unknown.

FuelCell_MaintenanceDueStatus.description: Units: BitArray, each bit represents a specific service interval. The Fuel Cell Maintenance Due status as a bit array, where multiple service intervals can be due at the same time, so any combination of the 6 service intervals are valid.

oneOf.title: NotDue
oneOf.description: No Maintenance Due for Fuel Cell.

oneOf.title: 250Hr
oneOf.description: 250 hour Maintenance Due for Fuel Cell.

OperatorId.description: ID of operator currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

FacilityCode.description: ID embedded in operator access card, normally referred to as site or facility code. Helps to determine which operator is currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.
